text: Peter Florjančič (5 March 1919 – 14 November 2020) was a Slovenian inventor and Olympic athlete. He competed at the 1936 Summer Olympics. He invented a perfume atomiser, plastic injection molding machines, and the plastic photographic slide frame.Phil Cain, Peter Florjancic: Slovenian inventor extraordinaire, BBC news (2011-04-12) Florjančič died on 14 November 2020 at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Slovenia Category:Olympians for Yugoslavia Category:Inventors Category:Centenarians Category:Skiers
title: Peter Florjančič
